Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will meet your specific needs. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $18000, aiming to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business growth. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
